snippet: KOCK--Robert Marshall Sr.,age 73, of Bel Air, MD passed away on March 25, 2016. A Memorial Service will be held at Somerset Hills Memorial Park, 95 Mt. Airy Road, Basking Ridge, NJ on Saturday, April 9, 2016 at 11am For more information visit: www. mccomasfuneralhome.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KOCK, ROBERT MARSHALL SR.
